name: Quietly Observing
Lore: 'On her assignment to kill Sharad Hett, Aurra used her patience and cunning to help track down the Jedi Master.',
Text: 'Deploy on Aurra Sing. While Aurra is alone at a site, your total ability here = 0. During your move phase, may lose Effect to target an opponent''s lightsaber present. Draw destiny. If destiny > 3, Aurra may ''steal'' that lightsaber.',
